Parameters: float: The new offset of this bottom sheet within [-1,1] range. Offset increases as this bottom sheet is moving upward. From 0 to 1 the sheet is between collapsed and expanded states and from -1 to 0 it is between hidden and collapsed states.
onSlide(android.view.View, float).Description: Called when the bottom sheet is being dragged.

Parameters: int: The new state. This will be one of @B_android#support#design#widget#BottomSheetBehavior#STATE_DRAGGING_E@, @B_android#support#design#widget#BottomSheetBehavior#STATE_SETTLING_E@, @B_android#support#design#widget#BottomSheetBehavior#STATE_EXPANDED_E@, @B_android#support#design#widget#BottomSheetBehavior#STATE_COLLAPSED_E@, or @B_android#support#design#widget#BottomSheetBehavior#STATE_HIDDEN_E@.
onStateChanged(android.view.View, int).Description: Called when the bottom sheet changes its state.

ClassDesc: Callback for monitoring events about bottom sheets.
